subject: Attention Dear beneficiary,
body:
FROM UNITED NATION EUROPE

Attention Dear beneficiary,

I am Ms. Tatiana Valovaya, from United Nations Office at Geneva (UN
Geneva), I am writing to inform you that the matter of your fund worth
a sum of of $37.5 Million Us Dollars was brought to my office, And
your ownership certification has already be changed to another
person's name Mr. David Seger from COURT OF JUSTICE and your own
benefit has already be changed,

However. We asked Mr. David Seger what happened and who authorized him
to changed his name and address and he told us that you are the one
authorized him and also he told us that he is your blood brother but
you has an accident last week Friday and your in the hospital that is
why you authorized him to claim your fund but we are still confused,

Note; Mr. David Seger has already present $100 to obtain international
transfer permit which will declare your $37.5 Million Us Dollars free
from any money laundry, As what you told him because he said that you
refused to pay the $100 fee before you has an accident, Please we are
still confused because your ownership documentation has already be
changed,

God will protect you in Jesus name Amen,And we can release your fund
to your blood brother as you authorized him, But if you don't have an
accident and you don't authorized him we are giving you grace of
paying this US$100 fee today and tomorrow to receive your fund that is
finally, because Mr. David Seger has already deposited the $100 fee to
declare your $37.5 Million Us Dollars free from any money laundry,

I have taken my time to be in charge of your funds to ensure that you
receive your funds successfully into your bank account or cash check
with 100 % guarantee , This is your life opportunity and i don't want
you to lose your chance any more,

I will advice that you adhere to my instruction to meet up and buy the
$100 steam Card or i tunes card is acceptable,scratch it and attached
the picture to us,

Furthermore, you are advised to reconfirm below information as your
current and direct contact to avoid wrongful transfer or delivery.

1. Identification Name:
2 .your country
3 .your city
4. Current home address:
5. Direct phone Number(s):
6. Scan Copy of Your Identification
7. your Bank account
8, SEX

This is the last opportunity you have to comply to receive your fund
Worth of US$37. 5 Million United State Dollars to your designated
address, but remember that after (2 DAYS) you did not make the payment
then I will sign the document and divert your funds to the blood
brother that is finally and  this is the agreement concluded.

God bless you with your family in Jesus Name Amen,

Treat with urgency and meet up with my instruction,

Yours Faithfully,

Yours Sincerely,
Ms. Tatiana Valovaya
Director-General of the United Nations Office at Geneva,

subject: Re: Attention Dear beneficiary,
body:
Hello Ms. Tatiana Valovaya,

Thank you for reaching out to me and I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your email has left me a bit confused. I don't have a brother named David Seger and I certainly haven't been in any accidents recently, thank God.

I'm curious about this fund you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? How did it come into existence and why is it under my name? 

Also, could you explain what the steam card or tunes card is for? I'm not very familiar with these things.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Treat with urgency
body:
FROM THE Desk OF;Attorney Ms,Stella Charles in SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.
1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC 20500. USA.


Attention Dear beneficiary,

Greeting in the name of our almighty God, I am certain this message
might come to you as surprise.

I am Attorney Ms,Stella Charles, I want to inform you that the matter
of your fund was brought to my office in SUPREME COURT OF UNITED
STATES, Because the president and Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank
USA,  Mr.John C. Williams said that they will divert your funds which
worth a sum of of $75.5 Million Us Dollars to Government Treasuries
Account.

However. I asked Mr.John C. Williams what happened and he said that
you refused to pay the sum of US$370 to obtain Affidavit of claim
Ownership which will declare your $75.5 Million Us Dollars free from
any money laundry and terrorism drug money sponsor activities.

I have kindly understand that the US$370 fee might be too much for you
to pay now, So i make things easier for you by discussed with the
Mr.John C. Williams president and Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank
USA on your behalf to give you the grace of sending US$200 only today
until you receive your fund, And that is the only fee you have to pay,

NOTE: Every documentation proof for your fund have been packaged and
seal to be delivery together to your address immediately your fund
transfer into your bank account or you receive it inform of check. I
have been in this office for years and have helped a lot of people as
well, This is an opportunity for you to receive your fund NOW!. I will
advice that you adhere to my instruction to meet up and buy the $200
steam Card or i tunes card, Furthermore, you are advised to reconfirm
below information as your current and direct contact to avoid wrongful
delivery.

1. Identification Name:
2 .your country
3 .your city
4. Current home address:
5. Direct phone Number(s):
6. Scan Copy of Your Identification
7. your bank account

My dear, this is the last opportunity you have to comply to receive
your fund Worth of US$75.5 Million United State Dollars to your
designated address bey check, but remember that after (2 DAYS) you
don't make the payment then I will sign the document and divert your
funds to the US Government Treasury.God bless you,

Treat with urgency,

Yours Faithfully,

Attorney Ms,Stella Charles,
FROM THE SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.

subject: Re: Treat with urgency
body:
Hello Attorney Charles,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware that there was a fund in my name. Can you please tell me more about how this came to be? 

Also, could you explain what the Affidavit of Claim Ownership is? I'm not very familiar with legal terms and procedures.

I appreciate your understanding regarding the fee. However, before proceeding further, I would like to know more about the process of transferring these funds. Could you provide some details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Attn: Beneficiary.

I am Mr.António Guterres Secretary-General of the United Nations, we
have earlier re-called your Fund totally sum of ($2.5billion) U.S
dollars from West Africa,

We have found out that you abandon your fund for very long time, What
could be your reason of refusal and chosen to abandon such huge amount
of money, I guarantee that this fund will be transfer under a
legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the
law, This could be the last opportunity you might have in receiving
your inheritance fund,

Bear it in mind that I have taken my time to be in charge of your
funds as instructed by authority to ensure that you receive your funds
successfully into your bank account to start enjoying your benefits,

Secondly,the only money you have to pay is $175 to obtain the
international transfer permit from the concerned authorities, And if
you failed to comply by sending this fee in next two days your fund
will be divert it into government treasuries account,

the reason why the fee is required is to have your international
transfer permit from the concerned authorities on your behalf before
your fund will be transfer into your account,

However, you should kindly reconfirm with me the following information below:

Full Name......
Mailing Address.....
country..........
City...........
Tel.....
Next of kin......
Bank details...
your Age
your ID card

I am 100% sure that this payment is in your name and belongs to you
that is why i am contacting you, And you a limit time two days to pay
the fee,

Please find $175 Steam Wallet Gift Card or Sephora Card iTunes Gift
Cards is acceptable,scratch it and attached the picture to us, just
for your own good,

please do not delay to send this fee today or tomorrow because this is
a last chance and final conclusion. Kindly do your best now to send
the Fee and update me immediately,

God bless you more together with your family,

Yours Sincerely,
Mr.António Guterres
Secretary-General of the United Nations,

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Hello nio Guterres,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware that I had any funds in West Africa. How did you come across this information? 

I'm not sure why I would abandon such a large sum of money. It's possible there may have been some misunderstanding or miscommunication. Could you please provide more details about the origin of these funds and how they came to be associated with my name?

You mentioned needing to obtain a transfer permit from the concerned authority. Could you explain what this permit is and why it's necessary? Also, who exactly is this concerned authority?

I'm sorry but I can't provide the personal information you requested at this time. However, I am interested in learning more about this situation.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Attention Dear Sole Beneficiary.
body:
From SunTrust Banks united states of America,


Attention Dear Sole Beneficiary.

This is to inform you that we have sent you this email notification
regarding the final release order of your approval payment files from
(2) different banks, Your payment files from (2) different banks,
Deutsche Bank AG Europe and SunTrust Banks New York USA was compiled
and submitted to my desk this month for review. The total sum owed to
you by the 2 banks mentioned above was sum up to the tune of
US$1,5Billion United State Dollars)

Now the fund has been totally lodged in one particular Escrow account
(non deductible) here in SunTrust Banks New York USA on your name,
while waiting for accreditation to your personal bank account in any
part of the world for the quickly transfer.

Meanwhile, after due scrutiny and verification, I confirmed that you
have fulfilled all the necessary obligations that will enable the
release of your payment US$1,5Billion United State Dollars) to you,
but yet your payment was not released to you due to one flimsy excuses
or the other from the Bank officials in charge of your payment,
because they had the intention of diverting your funds to their
private accounts in order to satisfy their interest.

Secondly,the only money you pay for the transfer to take place is just
$200 being the approval payment certification from the government
Europe ,And you are giving a limited time to send the payment and
please
be advise that you are to send the payment to American Embassy office
in Europe and you are to use this information to send the $200 and
please be informed that you are not going to pay any other payment to
any body and do not be deceived by any body to send any other payment.

As soon as the Payment information is received, your funds will be
wired to your bank account directly from SunTrust Banks New York USA.
We shall proceed to issue all payments details to the said Ms.Caroline
Daniel as your next of kin, If you failed to comply by sending this
fee within Two working days from today.This is your Opportunity,

Be advised to send the fee through
BTc, ACCOUNT
1FdcBLAztpXhUfgMWrvgp7BBH6vscbEgxy,

or You can buy $200 Razor Gold Card or I Tunes card or Steam wallet
card gently scratch it and send the photo to us,

Note: If you will prefer to receive your funds in form of a ATM CARD,
Then we could load your funds into ATM CARD and post it to your remote
mail boxes, I am 100% sure that this can be released to your account
within 48 hours if you work diligently with me for these days.

You Are Required To Re-Confirm The Following Details:

First Name :
Last Name :
State Of Origin:
Phone Number:
Residential Address:
Email Address:
Occupation:
Sex: Male
Bank Name:
Bank Address:
Account Number:
Account Name:
Routing Number:
Swift code :

Get back to us now with good news.

Treat with urgency,

Congratulations
Yours in Service,
Mr.William Rogers
chairman and chief executive officer (CEO) of SunTrust Banks New York USA.

subject: Re: Attention Dear Sole Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Rogers,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I didn't know that there were funds owed to me by these banks. Could you please explain how this situation came about? How did my name end up on these payment files?

Also, could you clarify what the approval payment from the government Europe is for? Is it some sort of processing fee?

I'm not very familiar with Razor Gold Card or Tunes card or Steam wallet card. Could you guide me on where I can purchase these cards?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Attention; please Beneficiary.
body:
From Ziraat Bank Turkey, Headquarter Ankara, Turkey,

Fax +90 312-584 25 51
Website www.ziraatbank.com.tr
SWIFT Code TCZBTR2A
Founded 1863,


Attention; please Beneficiary.

This is two times we have sent you this email notification regarding
the final release order of your over due payment from Ziraat Bank
Turkey was compiled and submitted to my desk last week for review. The
total fund sum of $35.5Million USD,

Now your fund has been totally lodged here in Ziraat Bank Turkey on
your name, while waiting for accreditation to your personal bank

Secondly,You have to pay $100 required for the Fund Transfer Permit
Certificate from the (IMF) authority immediately from today until
Monday, February 26, 2024 ,otherwise your fund will be divert to
Turkey government account by the authority ,This is your life
opportunity,

As soon as the Payment information is received, your funds will be
wired into your bank account directly from Ziraat Bank Turkey
successfully.

sebd the $100 fee by Bitcoin, ACCOUNT
(1FdcBLAztpXhUfgMWrvgp7BBH6vscbEgxy)

But if you can't send by Bitcoin buy iTunes card sum of US$100 gently
scratch it and send the photo to me immediately for your own favor.

However,we Required To Re-Confirm The Following Details As Specified
Below To Enable Us Transfer your fund into Your Bank Account Details
As Instructed

Mr.Alpaslan ÇAKAR.

subject: Re: Attention; please Beneficiary.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your effort in trying to help me with the transfer of funds. However, I have a few questions that I would like to clarify before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please explain why there is a need for a Fund Transfer Permit from the IMF authority? Is this a standard procedure for all international transfers?

Secondly, you mentioned that the fee can be sent via Bitcoin or by buying a card. Could you please elaborate on this process? How does it work and why is it necessary?

Lastly, could you provide more details about Ziraat Bank Turkey? It would be great if you could share some information about its history, reputation, and any notable achievements.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Attention Dear beneficiary
body:
Attention Dear beneficiary

I am Mrs.Marija Pejcinovic Buric Secretary General of the Council of Europe.

In accordance to my religious persuasion and total submission to the will
of God almighty,I felt expedient to write and inform you on the wicked
conspiracy hatched by Mr.Christian Sewing the chief executive in Deutsche
Bank AG, Germany(The foreigner he involved) to divert your approved
inheritance funds to their designated account in Europe. From my position
as a European Secretary, I discovered that they moved your fund of US$37.5
Million to Switzerland Europe several months ago with intention of sharing
it between themselves if they had succeeded .

Just last weeks I found out through the Central computer data-base that
they are about to re-route your fund from Bank of Europe to Credit  Suisse
Groupe Switzerland before European Financial Regulators traced the money, I
felt that it is important for me to alert you on this development.

They are still using your name and inheritance identification number as the
beneficiary but they have changed the account co-ordinate claiming that you
were the person who asked them to represent you and authorized them to
transferred the money out of Europe to Asia. This was the reason why they
asked you for endless fee to frustrate you so as to abandon the claim for
them to enrich themselves,

I have found out that Mr.Christian Sewing Chairman are using your money to
trade at the International Market buying stocks and making interest while
delaying your payment. These officials use delay tactics to hold on to your
payment while they make money. They will tell you that your transfer or
check will be delivered today and when that time comes, they will come up
with another excuse why your payment was stopped or cancelled.

I am contacting you secretly believing that you will keep this as top
secret. I want to work with you to move these funds to your account within
48 hours or ATM Visa Card or Check could be shipped to your home address
depending on your choice you want to receive your fund, The only charge you
will ever have to pay is $100.00 and it had to be written down in Court
that you will never pay any other money apart from the USD$100.00 to enable
the origin secure the required Tax Clearance papers in your name to enhance
the immediate transfer of your US$37.5 Million us dollars or ATM Visa Card
or Check depending on your choice,

I have the reference number of the transaction. Your payment is supposed to
go through the Swiss credit control financial clearing house before finally
Lodge into their Swiss account the European
financial regulators traced the fund.

NOTE I repeat, please do not expose my person, it is not easy to help you
receive your funds. You are hereby advised to purchase $100 Nordstrom card
or Sephora Card or Steam Wallet Gift Card $100 to enable me obtain your Tax
Clearance papers for immediate release your funds, I have worked out
modalities on how this transfer will be effected to your account
immediately for you to start enjoying your benefits.

I ask that you keep this very secret and confidential until transfer is
confirmed in your account or via ATM Card depending on your choice. Just
stop communicating with the wicked Mr.Christian Sewing Chairman of
the Board and don't even answer any of his mails again. My problem is that
I hate to see people being cheated for no reason. You are hereby advised to
purchase $100 those gift Card scratch off the label and
attached the picture to this email.

This instruction and the law abides to last but 3 days. Note that your fund
will hit to your bank account immediately we receive the Tax Clearance
papers from the IRS. Thank you for your kind attention. I needed your full
information,

Yours faithfully,
Remain Blessed,
Mrs.Marija Pejcinovic Buric,
Secretary General of Europe.

subject: Re: Attention Dear beneficiary
body:
Hello Pejcinovic Buric, Secretary General of Europe,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about all these happenings. It's hard to believe that such things are happening behind the scenes.

I'm curious though, how did you come across this information? And why have you chosen to share it with me specifically? 

Also, could you please explain more about the Nordstrom card or Sephora Card or Steam Wallet Gift Card? How will purchasing these cards help in obtaining the Tax Clearance papers?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James
